UiWidgetTextFieldTestImpl, UiWidgetToggleButtonGwt, UiWidgetTreeGwt, UiWidgetTreeTestImpl

    public interface UiFeatureFocus
extends UiFeature, AttributeWriteFocused
    This is the interface for the features of a focusable object. It can check and set its focus and allows to add and remove instances of UiHandlerEventFocus.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addFocusHandler(UiHandlerEventFocus handler)
      This method adds the given UiHandlerEventFocus to this object.
      boolean removeFocusHandler(UiHandlerEventFocus handler)
      This method removes the given UiHandlerEventFocus from this object.

      • Methods inherited from interface net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.attribute.AttributeReadFocused

        isFocused

      • Methods inherited from interface net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.attribute.AttributeWriteOnlyFocused

        setFocused

    • Method Detail

      • addFocusHandler

        void addFocusHandler(UiHandlerEventFocus handler)
        This method adds the given UiHandlerEventFocus to this object.
        Parameters:
        handler - is the UiHandlerEventFocus to add.

      • removeFocusHandler

        boolean removeFocusHandler(UiHandlerEventFocus handler)
        This method removes the given UiHandlerEventFocus from this object.
        Parameters:
        handler - is the UiHandlerEventFocus to remove.
        Returns:
        true if the handler has been removed successfully, false if it was NOT registered and nothing has changed.
